ModMetaData.name: 1940 Nations Factions
ModMetaData.author: trukulo
ModMetaData.description: A simple mod that incorporates 1940 Nations in factions. The 1940 Nations Factions Mod for RimWorld immerse players in a dystopian future where the nations of that era have expanded their influence into the cosmos. A place where WW2 never took place, and instead, they traveled to the stars and started a Intergalactic War.
